channel.title: Need help READ! server help
channel.description: hello i cannot log into 127.0.0.1 though i have everything i need when i tried to use the default gate way it lets me on and only people from that ip can login.... i think well people said to login to 127.0.0.1 and it works....... but....... it doesnt load it just freeses and says loading please wait and if u close the window and open it back up its all white....... help!!!!!! my brother was able to login though i just want to register it into the list and login normally to make sure im not logging in wrong......... or can you make us an ip and your aloud to come into it and ill make you staff and what number of rights is co owner??? thanks........

item.title: Need help READ! server help
item.dc:creator: @confusing_coder confusing_coder
item.description:
@confusing_coder wrote:

im 0nlyy:

doesnt it need to be running for 24 hours to be online?

Nop just needs to be running 24 hours to show up as 100% in moparscape status page… But a good question.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help READ! server help
item.dc:creator: @im_0nlyy im 0nlyy
item.description:
@im_0nlyy wrote:

never mind i found it out ;D finally lol i just needed to DOWNLOAD the moparscape… try to join tacticalpkzz.no-ip.org and see if itll let you… doesnt it need to be running for 24 hours to be online?

item.title: Need help READ! server help
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

huh i dont unsterstand what you mean u cant log in on an local port?? 127.0.0.1 = 0.0.0.0 its a local port 2 but i dont understand your problem u want a no-ip?
